title: Yellowstone Below the Falls
medium:
Recto: Graphite, brush with sepia and white-gray watercolor on paper.
Verso: Graphite on paper.
description:
Recto: Horizontal view of stream in foreground, castle-like cliffs in right middle ground, and large mountain range in background.
Verso, in opposite direction: a huge human figure standing upon cliffs.
name: Drawing
